flawed_nl_solution:
Each person brought 5 bags * 50 pounds per bag = <<5*50=250>>250 pounds per person.
There are 6 people * 250 pounds per person = <<6*250=1500>>1500 pounds of luggage on the plane.
The plan can hold 6000 pounds - 1500 pounds = <<6000-1500=45000>>45000 pounds of luggage space left.
The plane can hold an additional 45000 pounds / 50 pounds per bag = <<45000/50=900.0>>900.0 pieces of luggage.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4500, not 45000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
